newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.25 percent.
newsitem.headline: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.25 percent.

text.p: The Bank of Finland on Tuesday drained 2.16 billion markka of spot liquidity in an auction of one-month paper at an unchanged 3.25 percent tender rate.
Before the opening, the central bank forecast a spot liquidity surplus of 12.9 billion markka. The required daily balance for banks was 6.33 billion markka.
The Bank of Finland's tender rate -- its chief monetary policy tool -- was lowered to 3.25 percent from 3.50 percent on August 23.
